debutant.nom: Multiball training with a coach or practice partner
debutant.description: Practice looping against backspin with a coach or practice partner who feeds balls to you, allowing you to practice looping against different spins and speeds.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice looping against backspin with your forehand and backhand, alternating between the two.
Practice looping against different spin combinations, such as backspin to the middle followed by topspin to the wide forehand.
Practice playing three shots: a backhand from the backhand side, a forehand from the backhand side, and then a forehand from the forehand side.
Practice looping against random topspin shots, either to two spots or all parts of the table.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Short ball followed by a deep ball drill
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice pushing or flipping a short ball and then looping a deep ball.

metriques_progression: Up to one per second or so

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Make sure to practice multiball training regularly to improve your looping skills.
